FuncDef: The display acl user-group command displays the ACL that is applied to a specified user-group or any user-group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a user-group.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

Examples: The following ACL match user-group test:
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Multiple rules in a user-based ACL can be applied to a user-group. This command can be used to display the ACL that is applied to a user-group.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
